```python
#!/usr/bin/python2
import gmpy
import base64

def text2Int(text):
    return reduce(lambda x, y : (x << 8) + y, map(ord, text))

msg = ''

e =  65537
c = text2Int(base64.b64decode(msg))
p = 
t = p-1 
d = gmpy.invert(e,t)
plain = hex(pow(int(c),d,p))[2:]
flag = plain.decode("hex")
print "The Flag is %s "  % flag 

```

The Flag is The empire secret system has been exposed ! The top secret flag is : Flag{S1nGL3_PR1m3_M0duLUs_ATT4cK_TaK3d_D0wn_RSA_T0_A_Sym3tr1c_ALg0r1thm}
